B

Represents a bomb utilized by the Player

Creates a new bomb object, requires location which the bomb is placed.

Creates a Bomb object on the current location of the player and adds it to the list of Bombs created by the Player.

S

Inital setup for all classes.
setup(PApplet) - Static method in class demolition.Bomb
Loads in all the sprites required to generate the bomb and explotion animation on the app.
setup(PApplet) - Static method in class demolition.BomberMap
Loads the required four Tile objects (Empty, Broken, Wall, Goal) and their respective sprites.
setup(PApplet) - Static method in class demolition.Player
Loads in all the sprites required to generate the Player object's animation on the app.
setup(PApplet) - Static method in class demolition.RedEnemy

setup(PApplet) - Static method in class demolition.UI

setup(PApplet) - Static method in class demolition.YellowEnemy

T

tick() - Method in class demolition.App
Logic control of each class, refresh game configurations when signalled.
tick(BomberMap, Player, List<RedEnemy>, List<YellowEnemy>) - Method in class demolition.Bomb
The bomb will explode when it is rendered for the specified amount of frames.
tick() - Method in class demolition.GameMechanics
Logic of main game mechanics, which includes checking if the Player and enemies (RedEnemy and Yellowenemy objects) have crossed path, checking timer and Player life count (if timer reaches zero or the Player loses all its life, game ends), checking if the Player has passed a level (reaches Goal location) and signals refresh and update of game configurations.
tick(BomberMap) - Method in class demolition.RedEnemy
Movement logic of the RedEnemy.
tick(BomberMap) - Method in class demolition.YellowEnemy
Movement logic of the YellowEnemy.
Tile - Class in demolition
Represents the tiles on the map layout.
Tile(String, PImage) - Constructor for class demolition.Tile
Creates a new Tile object.
TIME_PER_SPRITE - Variable in class demolition.BomberChar
Represents the time each sprite shoud be rendered before moving to onto the next sprite of the cycle.
TIME_PER_SPRITE_BOMB - Variable in class demolition.Bomb
Represents the time each sprite shoud be rendered before moving to onto the next sprite of the cycle.
timerTick() - Method in class demolition.UI
Logic to control time decrement.
TOTAL_FRAMES - Variable in class demolition.BomberChar
Represents the total number of frames the character will be rendered in one cycle.
TOTAL_FRAMES_BOMB - Variable in class demolition.Bomb
Represents the total number of frames the bomb will be rendered in one cycle.
TOTAL_FRAMES_EXPLOSION - Variable in class demolition.Bomb
Represents the total number of frames the explosion will be rendered in one cycle.
